attributes.action: Make marijuana a legal controlled drug
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as British citizens deserve the right to use marijuana in a controlled manner as it has been proved to do less damage to you than alcohol, so please use your heads and don't buy in to all the fear so just try to do whats right and it will be worth your while. So please sign up and make marijuana legal, Thank you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
